job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsExcellent written and verbal communication skills.
• Strong programming skills in Python with hands-on experience with Dask for distributed data processingFamiliarity with ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and modern deep learning architecturesUnderstanding of imaging fundamentals: raw sensor data, ISP outputs, color spaces, and image quality metrics.
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field with relevant experience in data engineering and computer vision/imaging domains.
• Proven ability to collaborate across multiple teams including data collection/annotation, ML researchers, and camera feature teams.
• Ability to work independently and resolve infrastructure challenges with minimal support.
